ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Handbook HR Solutions Order Record Type" ), ( X8_x_11__c ), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Outside_Color__c, ''))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Template__c, ''))) ), (Historical_Order_Indicator__c = 0), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"HR Essentials"))), (NOT(BEGINS($Profile.Name,"System Administrator"))) )
